DC blocking filter. More...

#include <BlockDC.h>

Public Member Functions

 BlockDC ()
 Construct a new DC blocking filter.
This does not initialize the filter.
A call to reset() and set_cutoff() is required before processing!
 
void reset (double _sample_rate)
 Reset filter state and initialize sample rate.
Requires call before processing.
 
void set_cutoff (double freq)
 Set cutoff frequency of the filter.
Frequencies below this value will be sharply attenuated.
The filter has zero output at f = 0Hz.

 Process one sample through the filter.
